rating.title: We need your support.
rating.description: If you are satisfied with our products and services, please give us your evaluation to help us improve better!
progressing.title: Translation tasks:
progressing.finished: The translation has been completed. The translated content needs to be published before it takes effect.
progressing.contact: Free translation credits are insufficient. Please purchase credits and retry the translation.
progressing.somethingWentWrong: Some unexpected errors occurred. Please click the button to contact support for resolution.
progressing.privateApiKeyAmountLimit: The private Apikey limit has been reached. Please click the button on the right to reset the limit and restart the translation.
progressing.hasPayed: Your translation credits have been added. Please proceed with the translation.
contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions or need assistance, please click the button below to contact support.
userGuide.title: User Guide
userGuide.feature1: How to translate your Shopify store?
userGuide.feature2: How to enable the App from Shopify theme customization to apply the language & currency exchange switcher
userGuide.feature3: How to set up multi-currency pricing on your Shopify store?
dashboard.description1: We support more than 100 languages and use professional large language models such as Open AI and DeepSeek for translation
dashboard.description2: We support more than 100 currencies, and can switch currencies at any time according to IP to increase order conversion rate
dashboard.title3: We are constantly developing new features
dashboard.description3: We are fully committed to helping our customers succeed. Please feel free to contact us if you need any help.
transLanguageCard1.title: Translate your store
transLanguageCard1.description: Click Translate. In the next step, you can set the translation conditions and implement professional local translation based on powerful AI.
transLanguageCard2.title: Manage store languages
transLanguageCard2.description: Add, delete and publish languages, support manual management of translations
transLanguageCard3.title: We guarantee 100% translation service quality
transCurrencyCard1.title: Setting up multiple currencies
transCurrencyCard1.description: Depending on the market you set, we will automatically match currencies and allow for exchange rate adjustments
transCurrencyCard2.title: How to set currency code?
transCurrencyCard2.description: Setting a currency code allows you to switch currencies
transCurrencyCard3.title: How do I set up a currency language switcher?
transCurrencyCard3.description: Setting up a switcher allows you to better achieve dynamic switching and improve visitor conversion rates
planCard.title: Develop for customer success
planCard.description: If there is no feature you want, please feel free to submit and vote, we will iterate a new feature every week!

planCardTableList2.title: Vote

Welcome to our app! If you have any ques: Welcome to our app! If you have any questions, feel free to email us at support@ciwi.ai, and we will respond as soon as possible.
Some content of the store does not compl: Some content of the store does not comply with OpenAI's translation policy, please contact us for manual support.
Can't find the language you want to tran: Can't find the language you want to translate into? Click here to add a language.
When using this feature, we only consume: When using this feature, we only consume the quota of the corresponding interface and will not charge any additional fees. To avoid exceeding the third-party API quota limits and incurring charges, please set the quota limits carefully.
